entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH, Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 p.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy changing to periods of light snow this evening. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
